sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-alert
      border="left"
      close-text
      dismissible
      dark
      color="green accent-4"
      v-if="show"
    >
      Thêm thành công!
    </v-alert>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title class="font">Thêm Thành Viên</v-card-title>
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="submitForm"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="users.name"
              label="tên thành viên"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="users.gender"
              label="Giới tính"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="users.email" label="Email" :rules="rules">
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="users.password" label="Mật khẩu">
            </v-text-field>

            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">add</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "@/services/api.user";
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is required"],
      products: {
        name: "",
        qty: "",
        price: "",
        detail: "",
        image: "",
      },
      image: "",
      show: false,
    };
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
